cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an unknown value 'invalid' will cause the ASN.1 processing to fail and potentially crash the CU during message encoding/decoding.

du.explanation_en: Setting maximum MIMO layers to an invalid value of 99 will cause physical layer configuration errors and prevent proper MIMO transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效值 99 會導致實體層配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 MIMO 傳輸設定。
